## Security checklist

- [ ] No secrets, keys, or mnemonics in code or logs
- [ ] No `unsafe` blocks without justification
- [ ] ERC-20 interactions check return values (if applicable)

- [ ] Spending limits cannot overflow or underflow (if applicable)
